channel.title: Operations Research on Hadir's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Operations Research on Hadir's Notes

item.description: --- ## MIP Model for the TSP in Python This is the model for the TSP writed in Python and using Gurobi solver. The model builds the optimal exact route between a set of cities. It has as parameters: - `inst` an object of type Instance - `soln` an object of type Solution See the model: Pres Loads the required packages: import os from gurobipy import * from datetime import datetime Imports auxiliary objects:
